attributes.additional_details: Individuals members have been failed by.trade unions, they.are contributing but are not receiving service when needed, there are many members who have lost their jobs because unions have not represented them even though they have paid thousands of pounds. When they have complained to the certification office they have a been told Unions are not regulated, why.are they not regulated ?
attributes.background: Trade unions individual members are being let down, there is no monitoring so members can held them to account.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to regulate trades unions.
